name: Expedia & Hotels.com Reviews
special_instructions: startUrls is a required field. It should contain the URLs of hotels to scrape reviews from. If you add any userData, it will be included in each review for given hotel under the key customData
maxReviewsPerHotel is an optional field. It determines the maximum number of reviews to scrape per hotel
debugLog is an optional field. It enables more verbose logging
maxRequestRetries is an optional field. It determines the maximum number of retries when a request fails

sortBy is an optional field. It does not affect the order of reviews in the dataset, since review items are scraped in parallel, so later pages might finish before previous ones. However, it helps in the case you are limited by the number of reviews you can scrape
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
